item.title: Your Legacy System is Trying to Tell You Something (And It's Not 'Please Reboot')
item.description: You know that uneasy feeling when your car makes a noise it’s definitely not supposed to make? That moment when you turn down the radio, tilt your head, and think, “Maybe if I ignore it, it’ll go away”? Well, your legacy system is making those noises right now, and trust me â€“ it won’t go away by itself. I’ve spent the last 15 years listening to legacy systems whisper (and sometimes scream) their stories.
